label: Year 0
title: Collapse of the Old World
summary: Global infrastructure fails in a cascading series of events, marking the end of the Old World.
body: Satellite networks go dark, major cities experience simultaneous blackouts, and supply chains shatter in a matter of days.
This event becomes the reference point for all later timelines, often simply called 'the Collapse'.

label: Year 5
title: Founding of the Berlin Safe Zone
summary: Survivors fortify Berlin into one of the first major Safe Zones.
body: Remnants of local military forces and civilians collaborate to establish the Berlin Safe Zone.
Walls are raised, districts are assigned, and the first ration system is introduced.
